fullText:
Dusk Elf Weapon Training

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Dusk Elf Stealth
Benefit: You gain proficiency with simple and military light blades, and you gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with these weapons. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 69.
name: Dusk Elf Weapon Training
